Workshop in Woodmead Trains African Creators on AI and Digital Twin Tech
description: A Woodmead-based workshop is equipping African digital creators with practical skills in artificial intelligence and digital twin technology, signalling a shift in how the continent’s creative economy competes on a global stage. The first Digital Twin and AI Creator Enablement Workshop on the continent brought together more than 20 award-winning South African digital creators who [...]

title: Jesta I.S. Launches FarsightIQ: ML + Agentic AI Power Actionable Retail Intelligence
description: MONTREAL — Jesta I.S. today announced the launch of FarsightIQ, a new AI-focused division delivering what the company calls one of retail’s most advanced AI-driven commerce platforms—where machine learning and agentic AI don’t just predict what’s next, they help retailers act on it. “After 55 years of deep retail expertise, the rapid evolution of AI [...]

title: How AI Can Be Humanity’s Strongest Defence Against Disasters
description: AI is helping spot disasters early, protect infrastructure, and save lives before chaos begins. The real question is who gets the warning in time.
